Translations.Text: Zhenzhu yingxu (tamen shengli), zhenzhu bing bu shuangyue, dan renmen daban bu zhidao.
Tamen zhi zhidao jinshi shenghuo de biaomian, tamen duiyu houshi, shi shuhu de.
Nandao tamen meiyou siwei ma? Zhenzhu chuangzao tiandi wanwu, zhi yi zhenli he dingqi, you xuduo ren dique bu xin jiang yu tamen de zhu xiang hui.

Nandao tamen meiyou zai dadishang luxing er guancha qian ren de jieju shi zenyang de ma? Qian ren bi tamen nuli geng da, qian ren yu difang de ken zhi he jianshe, shengguo tamen. Tamen zu zhong de shizhe lailin tamen, zhenzhu buzhi kui wang tamen, dan tamen kui wangle ziji,
ranhou e bao nai zuo'e zhe de jieju, yinwei tamen fouren zhen zhu de jixiang, erqie jiayi chaoxiao.
Zhen zhu chuangzao zhongsheng, ranhou zaizao tamen, ranhou, nimen bei zhao guiyu ta.
Fuhuo shi lailin zhi ri, fanzui de ren, jiangcheng jusang de.
Tamen de pei zhu zhong, jianglai meiyou wei tamen shuo qing de, tamen jiang fouren tamen de pei zhu.
Fuhuo shi lailin zhi ri, tamen jiang bici fenli.
Zhiyu xindao erqie xingshan zhe, jiang zai yige shengdi, ganjue kuaile;
